trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the collection of indexes of checked items (including items in an indeterminate state) in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 封裝 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> 中已選取項目 (包括不定狀態中的項目) 的索引集合。

trans-unit.source: The checked indexes collection is a subset of the indexes into the collection of all items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 已檢查的索引集合是索引中的所有項目集合內的子集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: These indexes specify items in a checked or indeterminate state.
trans-unit.target: 這些索引指定中已核取或是不定狀態的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following table is an example of the indexed collection of items in the control (all items contained in the control).
trans-unit.target: 下表是控制項 （控制項中包含的所有項目） 中項目的索引集合的範例。

trans-unit.source: Index
trans-unit.target: 索引

trans-unit.source: Item
trans-unit.target: 項目

trans-unit.source: Check State
trans-unit.target: 核取狀態

trans-unit.source: object 1
trans-unit.target: object 1

trans-unit.source: object 2
trans-unit.target: 物件 2

trans-unit.source: object 3
trans-unit.target: 物件 3

trans-unit.source: object 4
trans-unit.target: 物件 4

trans-unit.source: object 5
trans-unit.target: 物件 5

trans-unit.source: Based on the previous example, the following table shows the indexed collection of indexes of checked items.
trans-unit.target: 根據上一個範例下, 表顯示索引的選取項目的索引集合。

trans-unit.source: Index
trans-unit.target: 索引

trans-unit.source: Index of Item
trans-unit.target: 項目的索引

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> class has two members that allow you to access the stored indexes, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection.Item%2A> property and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection.IndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>類別有兩個成員，可讓您存取預存的索引，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection.Item%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Based on the previous example, a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection.Item%2A> property with a parameter value of 1 returns a value of 3.
trans-unit.target: 根據上述範例中，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection.Item%2A>屬性值為 1 的參數與傳回值為 3。

trans-unit.source: A call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection.IndexOf%2A> with a parameter of 3 returns a value of 1.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection.IndexOf%2A>3 的參數與傳回值為 1。

trans-unit.source: The following example enumerates the checked items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection> to see what check state an item is in.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會列舉中的選取項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>查看項目檢查狀態項目為。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A> method to set the check state of an item.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>方法，以設定項目的核取狀態。

trans-unit.source: The example also demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndices%2A> property to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItems%2A> property to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndices%2A>屬性來取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItems%2A>屬性來取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The first loop uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A> method to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> of each checked item, given the index of the item.
trans-unit.target: 第一個迴圈會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>方法來取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>的每個選取的項目，給定項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The second loop also uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>, but uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.IndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to retrieve the index for the item.
trans-unit.target: 第二個迴圈也會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>，但是會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.IndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法來擷取項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要放置在集合中的索引。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified index is located in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的索引是否位於集合中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified index from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection" /> is an item in this collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection" /> 中的指定索引是這個集合中的項目，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine whether an index from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Items%2A> collection is in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndices%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法，來決定是否從索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Items%2A>集合處於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndices%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The destination array.
trans-unit.target: 目的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based relative index in <c>dest</c> at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: <c>dest</c> 中以零起始的相對索引，即開始複製的位置。

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire collection into an existing array at a specified location within the array.
trans-unit.target: 將整個集合複製到現有陣列中的指定位置。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to combine the selected indexes from multiple collections into a single array.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來結合成單一陣列的多個集合從選取的索引。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多維的。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the source <see cref="T:System.Array" /> is greater than the available space from index to the end of the destination <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 來源 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的元素數目大於從索引至目的端 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 結尾的可用空間。

trans-unit.source: The type of the source <see cref="T:System.Array" /> cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 來源 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的類型無法自動轉換成目的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 的類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of checked items.
trans-unit.target: 取得已選取項目的數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of indexes in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的索引數。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndices" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回列舉值，可用來逐一查看 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndices" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> for navigating through the list.
trans-unit.target: 用來巡覽清單的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" />。

trans-unit.source: The index of the checked item.
trans-unit.target: 已選取項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns an index into the collection of checked indexes.
trans-unit.target: 傳回已選取索引集合內的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index that specifies the index of the checked item or -1 if the <paramref name="index" /> parameter is not in the checked indexes collection.
trans-unit.target: 索引，其指定已選取項目的索引；如果 <paramref name="index" /> 參數不在已選取的索引集合中，則為 –1。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the examples in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection" /> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection" /> 類別概觀中的範例。

trans-unit.source: The `index` parameter is the index of a checked item in the items collection.
trans-unit.target: `index`參數則是項目集合中的核取項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The return value is the corresponding index into the checked indexes collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是已檢查的索引集合的對應索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示集合是否為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 所有情況下都是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: An index into the checked indexes collection.
trans-unit.target: 已選取索引集合內的索引。

trans-unit.source: This index specifies the index of the checked item you want to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 這個索引指定您想要擷取之已選取項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of a checked item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> 控制項中已選取項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the checked item.
trans-unit.target: 已選取項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the examples in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection" /> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection" /> 類別概觀中的範例。

trans-unit.source: The `index` parameter is an index into the checked indexes collection.
trans-unit.target: `index`參數是已檢查的索引集合中的索引。

trans-unit.source: The return value is the corresponding indexed value, which is the index of the checked item in the items collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是對應的索引的值，這是已核取項目集合中項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="index" /> is not in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 不在集合中。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection" /> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示對 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection" /> 的存取是否同步 (安全執行緒)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 所有情況下都是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection of controls.
trans-unit.target: 取得可用來對控制項集合進行同步 (Synchronize) 存取的物件。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> used to synchronize to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 用來同步處理集合的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The object to be added to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 要加入 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection" /> 的物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds an item to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 將項目加入至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Add(System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Add(System.Object)" />。

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection> class directly.
trans-unit.target: 您無法變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>直接類別。

trans-unit.source: To add an item to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemChecked%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemCheckState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要將項目加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemChecked%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemCheckState%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Always thrown.
trans-unit.target: 一律擲回。

trans-unit.source: Removes all items from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection" /> 中移除所有項目。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Clear" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Clear" />。

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection> class directly.
trans-unit.target: 您無法變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>直接類別。

trans-unit.source: To clear the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemChecked%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemCheckState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要清除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemChecked%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemCheckState%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Always thrown.
trans-unit.target: 一律擲回。

trans-unit.source: The index to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要放置在集合中的索引。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified index is located within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的索引是否位於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection" /> 中。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Contains(System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Contains(System.Object)" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified index from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> is an item in this collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection" /> 之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> 中的指定索引為這個集合中的項目，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection" /> to locate in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 要放置在這個集合中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection" /> 以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.IndexOf(System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.IndexOf(System.Object)" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection" /> instance is cast to an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection" /> 執行個體轉換成 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The index at which value should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 應該插入值的索引。

trans-unit.source: The object to be added to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 要加入 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection" /> 的物件。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Insert(System.Int32,System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Insert(System.Int32,System.Object)" />。

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection> class directly.
trans-unit.target: 您無法變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>直接類別。

trans-unit.source: To add an item to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemChecked%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemCheckState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要將項目加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemChecked%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemCheckState%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Always thrown.
trans-unit.target: 一律擲回。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 所有情況下都是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to get.
trans-unit.target: 要取得的項目之索引 (此索引以零為起始)。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.IList.Item(System.Int32)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Collections.IList.Item(System.Int32)" />。

trans-unit.source: The index value from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection" /> that is stored at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection" /> 的索引值，該值儲存在指定的位置中。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The object to be removed from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 要從 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection" /> 中移除的物件。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Remove(System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Remove(System.Object)" />。

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection> class directly.
trans-unit.target: 您無法變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>直接類別。

trans-unit.source: To remove an item from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemChecked%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemCheckState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemChecked%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemCheckState%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Always thrown.
trans-unit.target: 一律擲回。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除之項目的以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: or a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt(System.Int32)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt(System.Int32)" />。

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection> class directly.
trans-unit.target: 您無法變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>直接類別。

trans-unit.source: To remove an item from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemChecked%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemCheckState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemChecked%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemCheckState%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Always thrown.
trans-unit.target: 一律擲回。
